unnormalised: Hey! Any news on Jadeja's knee after that strain during the Ranji match? Hopefully, it's nothing major. Heard Dhawan pulled a hamstring too, happened around 16:00 hrs, 12/07/2024. They're saying it's a Grade 2 tear. Poor thing. Is Bumrah back to bowling full tilt at the NCA yet? Heard he was targeting a return by 01/08/2024. Fingers crossed, yaar! India needs those wickets!
normalised: Hey! Any news on J A D E J A's knee after that strain during the Ranji match? Hopefully, it's nothing major. Heard Dhawan pulled a hamstring too, happened around sixteen hundred hours, twelfth july two thousand and twenty four. They're saying it's a Grade two tear. Poor thing. Is Bumrah back to bowling full tilt at the N C A yet? Heard he was targeting a return by first august two thousand and twenty four. Fingers crossed, yaar! India needs those wickets!
